name: Flatland Fighters
description:
Special thanks to: Atelier Rgss

Inspired by Edwin Abbott Abbott's masterpiece, play as A-Square as he fights against an army of circles and their leader, the dreaded three-dimensional A-Sphere.

Use the Arrow keys to control the Square.

Press Space to fire triangles.

Destroy all the circles to proceed to the next level.

Some circles may move faster than others.

Destroy all the Circles and the Sphere to win.
